name: Nuclear Termination
description:
Built for a university project in autumn 2019, Nuclear Termination sets the player in an first-person environment. A rebel group have taken control of a nuclear power plant, and plan to destroy the region through a nuclear explosion. You must progress through the city's power plant and disable all the computers which control the explosion while avoiding the enemy characters.

This project is just sitting as a prototype on my computer. No plans to continue but feedback/thoughts are welcomed.
